hero.headline: How to Add Music to YouTube Videos
hero.subheadline: Add background music legally. Avoid copyright strikes and monetization issues.

sections.content: Music enhances videos but wrong choices cause copyright claims, demonetization, or video removal. Using popular songs without license isn't worth the risk. Here's how to add music safely and where to find legal options.

faq.question: Can I use any song with credit?
faq.answer: No. Giving credit doesn't grant license. You need actual permission or license. Most popular songs will result in claims regardless of credit.

faq.question: What about copyright-free YouTube channels?
faq.answer: Some are legitimate, some aren't. Verify license terms. NoCopyrightSounds, Audio Library are generally safe. Always check.

faq.question: What happens if I get a claim?
faq.answer: Content ID claim usually means revenue goes to rights holder. Strike is more seriousâ€”affects channel standing. Dispute only if you have rights.

faq.question: Is YouTube Audio Library good enough?
faq.answer: For many creators, yes. Quality varies but good tracks available. Free and guaranteed safe. Paid services offer more variety and quality.
